content:
Hello
The links to US Core IG in the tool are pointing at US Core 4.0 pages instead of US Core 3.1.1. Vendor tells me all the Profile links do this.

Example:
Single Patient API -> AllergyIntolerance Tests -> About AllergyIntolerance -> Testing Methodology -> Profile Validation -> US Core AllergyIntolerance Profile link.
It goes to http://hl7.org/fhir/us/core/StructureDefinition/us-core-allergyintolerance
but it should go to http://hl7.org/fhir/us/core/STU3.1.1/StructureDefinition-us-core-allergyintolerance.html
